title: LISTEN: Super Sunday podcast - Liverpool v Tottenham and Crystal Palace v Newcastle
description: Listen to the Super Sunday podcast as Jamie Redknapp and Graeme Souness analysed Liverpool's thrilling draw with Tottenham as well as Crystal Palace v Newcastle.
content:
In the first game of the day, Palace came from behind to earn a 1-1 draw against Newcastle, with Luka Milivojevic scoring a second-half penalty for the hosts.
Tottenham then also battled back to take a point from an enthralling encounter against Liverpool.
Listen to the latest podcast in full and subscribe via iTunes.
